verbose_text: To further explore the heart morphology changes after exposure to alcohol, the expression of cardiac myosin light chain 2 (cmlc2), atrial myosin heavy chain (amhc) and ventricular myosin heavy chain (vmhc) were investigated in the ethanol treated and control larvae.
evidence: expression of cardiac myosin light chain 2 (cmlc2), atrial myosin heavy chain
